name: Ball Roll 3d: Alpha 0.1
description:
A game where you play as a ball and try to reach the end.

This game is currently in development so expect to see a lot of bugs.....

to leave the game, press Alt +  f4 on your Pc and fn + Alt + f4 on your laptop.

Controls: W, A, S, D

R to reset 

only available on Windows as of now.

This is not a virus
